nodes.text: Orrick Gwyndon was a Human male captain who served as a member of the Queensguard during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

In 3643 BBY, Orrick Gwyndon allied with Samara Organa, who wanted to discern the truth about the assassination of Senator Gaul Panteer and uncover his murderer. Together, they tasked a Republic ally with recovering the assassination holorecording from the library in the Holo Archives of Castle Panteer. After uncovering the truth, Orrick and the Queensguard were dispatched by Lady Katei Elinari Panteer to accompany Republic forces with the intention of arresting Bouris Ulgo.
Orrick appears in the mission "Red Handed" for Republic classes in the 2011 BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic.
